title: IDA:Search for all the occurrence of certain opcode/register in current graph view
content:
I know that, after double clicking on a opcode or register, all the occurance of the  opcode/register in the graph view are highlighted.
Is there any easy way to just search for a opcode or register in the current graph view?

answers_data.content:
There's a nifty plugin that allows that - localxrefs.
It looks up all the references of the currently highlighted identifier in the current function, and prints out a list of those.
